free.chess
Class ImagePiecePainter

java.lang.Object
  free.chess.ImagePiecePainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
PiecePainter
public class ImagePiecePainter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PiecePainter

An implementation of PiecePainter which paints images.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new ImagePiecePainter with the given preferred piece image size.

Constructor Detail

ImagePiecePainter

public ImagePiecePainter(java.awt.Dimension prefPieceSize,
                         java.util.Hashtable pieceImages)
Creates a new ImagePiecePainter with the given preferred piece image size. The given Hashtable should map Integer objects specifying the size of the piece images to Hashtables which in turn map Piece objects to piece Images.

Method Detail

Returns a shaded version of the specified image.
